title: Indonesia: new nation of Asia
creator_credit: William Deneen and Encyclopaedia Britannica Films
brief_description: An Indonesian teacher tells the story of his country. Traces the history of Indonesia from Dutch rule to independence; shows life in crowded cities and in the home of village families; examines the natural resources, religions, art and industries of the country, pointing out how living standards are improving.
